MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15am to replace faulty equipment close to the School Lane substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.50am on the 5th of March 2021.
